short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text-to-Speech Chrome Extension. Highlight the text, and click the extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use Text to Speech. Just highlight text on a web page, and press the monkey icon, and Talk-To-Me will, read you the text.

You can control the speed of the read back, as well as get a quick word count. Also, the words being spoken are highlighted, and the text is scrolled automatically to show the words as spoken,
